resources.string: "Can't use this app in Multi window view."
"Can't open more than %d apps in pop-up view."
Desktop mode is enabled. Tap to change to mirroring mode
Screen mirroring mode is enabled. Tap to change to desktop mode

"External display and mouse have been connected.
Do you want to launch DeX optimized for your desktop experience?"
Samsung DeX is optimized for environment with monitor and mouse. Tap download and install Samsung DeX.
Can’t open %1$s in Samsung DeX mode.
Your device is low on memory. Save your files and close unused applications.
Can’t enter Samsung DeX mode while power saving mode is on.
Connect your external display and mouse to try out Samsung DeX. You can use Samsung DeX mode optimized for big screen and keyboard/mouse.
DeX and mirroring can be set in the HDMI settings.
